verses.verse: A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> you have <S%H1961>been<s%> our <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> place in all <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H2962>Before<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth,<s%> or ever you had <S%H2342>formed<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8398>world,<s%> even from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> to <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%> you are <S%H410>God.<s%>

For a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%> are but as <S%H865>yesterday<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it is <S%H5674>past,<s%> and as a <S%H821>watch<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
You <S%H2229>carry<s%> them away as with a <S%H2229>flood;<s%> they are as a <S%H8142>sleep:<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> they are like <S%H2682>grass<s%> which <S%H2498>grows<s%> up.
In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> it <S%H6692>flourishes,<s%> and <S%H2498>grows<s%> up; in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> it is <S%H4135>cut<s%> down, and <S%H3001>wither.<s%>
For we are <S%H3615>consumed<s%> by your <S%H639>anger,<s%> and by your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> are we <S%H926>troubled.<s%>
You have <S%H7896>set<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> you, our <S%H5956>secret<s%> sins in the <S%H3974>light<s%> of your <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>
For <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H6437>passed<s%> away in your <S%H5678>wrath:<s%> we <S%H3615>spend<s%> our <S%H8141>years<s%> as a <S%H1899>tale<s%> that is told.

The <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H8141>years<s%> are three <S%H7657>score<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and ten; and <S%H518>if<s%> by reason of <S%H1369>strength<s%> they be <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> yet is their <S%H7296>strength<s%> <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H205>sorrow;<s%> for it is <S%H2440>soon<s%> <S%H1504>cut<s%> off, and we <S%H5774>fly<s%> away.
<S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H5797>power<s%> of your <S%H639>anger?<s%> even according to your <S%H3374>fear,<s%> so is your <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> <S%H3045>teach<s%> us to <S%H4487>number<s%> our <S%H3117>days,<s%> that we may <S%H935>apply<s%> our <S%H3824>hearts<s%> to <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H7725>Return,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long?<s%> and let it <S%H5162>repent<s%> you <S%H5921>concerning<s%> your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
O <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> us <S%H1242>early<s%> with your <S%H2617>mercy;<s%> that we may <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8056>glad<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H3117>days.<s%>
Make us <S%H8056>glad<s%> according to the <S%H3117>days<s%> wherein you have <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> us, and the <S%H8141>years<s%> wherein we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
Let your <S%H6467>work<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and your <S%H1926>glory<s%> to their <S%H1121>children.<s%>

And let the <S%H5278>beauty<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> be on us: and <S%H3559>establish<s%> you the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands<s%> on us; yes, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H3559>establish<s%> you it.
